p.s: Wrapper classes for the mnoGoSearch extention
p.d: This package provides wrapper classes for the mnoGoSearch search engine. The package has two central classes &quot;Search_Mnogosearch&quot; and &quot;Search_Mnogosearch_Result&quot;. The class &quot;Search_Mnogosearch&quot; gives an object that represents the search and the &quot;Search_Mnogosearch_Result&quot; the result. The usage is just like the usage in the &quot;DB&quot; and &quot;DB_result&quot; classes.
